column4: hi, i have a question about symbolic links, whenever i make them to any of my programs, like say matlab or eclipse or whatever, it always comes up with this annoying message, do you want to run this, display it or run in a terminal. is there a way to bypass this message and just start the prog
make a launcher rather than a symlink would be your best bet
right-click, Create Launcher, on the desktop or panels.
